title: On the injectivity and non-injectivity of the $l$-adic cycle class maps
abstract: We study the injectivity of the cycle class map with values in Jannsen's continuous étale cohomology, by using refinements that go through étale motivic cohomology and the ``tame'' version of Jannsen's cohomology. In particular, we use this to show that the Tate and the Beilinson conjectures imply that its kernel is torsion in positive characteristic, and to revisit recent counterexamples to injectivity.
comment: Slight changes; to appear in the proceedings of the BIRS-CMO Oaxaca workshop "Moduli, Motives and Bundles" (September 2022), Cambridge LMS Lecture Notes Series
